servinfo.title: Precautions of Electric Throttle Body System Calibration
servinfo.ptxt: After performing one of works described below, it is necessary to re-register the completely closed throttle valve reference position stored in memory of ECM. (For detailed information, refer to Description of Electric Throttle Body System Calibration:For Petrol Engine Model .) For the procedure to register such data in ECM, refer to Electric Throttle Body System Calibration:For Petrol Engine Model .

item.ptxt: To shut off backup power of ECM for such purposes of battery replacement or “DOME” fuse removal
To replace throttle body and/or accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly
